responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "BFF7633D42F7A2C258285D973633DCA3", "\"The trip back will require much of his essence and as such will leave him in a time of weakness. He will rush to construct siphons of essence that will allow him to regain his full power. These must be found and destroyed as they must exist in specific point of the arcane laylines. Destroy the siphon, destroy the djinn and most importantly, obtain his shackle, the wand called the Foci. It must be be placed within my secret tower vault where I shall await its return to me. Do not be seduced by its power.\"")
name: MIDD_0015_BFP_ClockworkCodex_11
